name: Encouraging Words
details: You give an ally within 30 feet a quick pep talk, helping them recover. Attempt a Diplomacy check. The DC is usually 15, though the GM might adjust it based on the circumstances. If you have expert proficiency in Diplomacy, you can instead attempt a DC 20 check to increase the Stamina Points recovered by 5; if you have master proficiency, you can attempt a DC 30 check to increase the Stamina Points by 15; if you have legendary proficiency, you can attempt a DC 40 check to increase the Stamina Points by 25. No matter the result, the ally is temporarily immune to Encouraging Words until they either Take a Breather or rest for the day.

criticalFailure: The ally takes 1d8 mental damage, but this can reduce only Stamina Points, never Hit Points.

description: You give an ally a quick pep talk, helping them recover.

name: Steel Your Resolve
details: Regain Stamina Points equal to half your maximum.
